pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Vicious is a modular widget library for x11-wm/awesome, derived from the Wicked widget library. It has some of the old Wicked widget types, a few of them rewritten, and a good number of new widgets.
With vicious you get only the framework to create your own stable configuration. Don't expect vicious to hold your hand. Don't even expect it to handle all errors. If you make a mistake your configuration can break. I encourage you to explore, and then modify each widget to suit your own needs.
